original_title: The Making of David Attenborough's Ant Mountain
overview: Enter the microscopic world of ants guided by Sir David Attenborough, and expert filmmaker Martin Dohrn. Get an exclusive look at the one-of-a-kind camera, that has allowed us to view the world of the ant and follow the lives of the worlds hardest working insects.
title: The Making of David Attenborough's Ant Mountain
